private_information: Scenario A Initial Conditions: cats object_0, collect object_10 object_2, collect object_5 object_1, collect object_6 object_1, collect object_7 object_1, collect object_8 object_2, collect object_9 object_2, hand object_11, hand object_12, hand object_13, next object_0 object_8, next object_11 object_10, next object_12 object_6, next object_13 object_9, next object_3 object_7, next object_4 object_10, sneeze object_3, sneeze object_4, spring object_5, spring object_8, stupendous object_1, stupendous object_2, texture object_10, texture object_5, texture object_6, texture object_7, texture object_8, texture object_9.
Scenario A Goal: next object_11 object_8, next object_12 object_8, next object_13 object_10.

Scenario A Plan: clip object_11 object_4 object_10; wretched object_3 object_7 object_6 object_1; clip object_12 object_3 object_6; wretched object_3 object_6 object_5 object_1; tightfisted object_12 object_3 object_5; wretched object_4 object_10 object_8 object_2; tightfisted object_11 object_4 object_8; wretched object_4 object_8 object_9 object_2; clip object_13 object_4 object_9; wretched object_4 object_9 object_10 object_2; tightfisted object_13 object_4 object_10; memory object_0 object_8 object_5; sip object_12 object_0 object_5; memory object_0 object_5 object_8; paltry object_12 object_0 object_8.
player.goal: Analyze Scenario A and verify action applicability and plan consistency. Produce a structured analysis summarizing action schemas, required facts, effects, and any missing or ambiguous elements. Do not emit final PDDL.

private_information: Scenario B Initial Conditions: cats object_0, collect object_10 object_2, collect object_5 object_1, collect object_6 object_1, collect object_7 object_1, collect object_8 object_2, collect object_9 object_2, hand object_11, hand object_12, hand object_13, next object_0 object_8, next object_11 object_10, next object_12 object_7, next object_13 object_7, next object_3 object_6, next object_4 object_9, sneeze object_3, sneeze object_4, spring object_5, spring object_8, stupendous object_1, stupendous object_2, texture object_10, texture object_5, texture object_6, texture object_7, texture object_8, texture object_9.
Scenario B Goal: next object_11 object_5, next object_12 object_9, next object_13 object_10.
Scenario B Plan: No explicit plan was provided for Scenario B in the input.
observer.goal: Analyze Scenario B and identify the differences with Scenario A. Provide a structured summary of state differences, constraints that matter for achieving the goal, and recommendations for actions to achieve the scenario goal. Do not emit final PDDL.

orchestrator.goal: Integrate analyses from other agents and synthesize a single PDDL domain plus one or more PDDL problem files suitable for the FastDownwards planner that encode the provided action schemas, initial states, and goals for the scenarios, keeping agent actions distinct where appropriate.

public_information: Objects include object_0 through object_13 and several collect and hand relationships referencing these objects.

Available actions with parameter patterns and their required and resulting facts are as follows. Paltry takes three parameters and requires hand obj0, cats obj1, texture obj2, vase obj0 obj1, and next obj1 obj2. Paltry makes next obj0 obj2 true and makes vase obj0 obj1 false.
Sip takes three parameters and requires hand obj0, cats obj1, texture obj2, next obj0 obj2, and next obj1 obj2. Sip makes vase obj0 obj1 true and makes next obj0 obj2 false.
Clip takes three parameters and requires hand obj0, sneeze obj1, texture obj2, next obj1 obj2, and next obj0 obj2. Clip makes vase obj0 obj1 true and makes next obj0 obj2 false.

Wretched takes four parameters and requires sneeze obj0, texture obj1, texture obj2, stupendous obj3, next obj0 obj1, collect obj1 obj3, and collect obj2 obj3. Wretched makes next obj0 obj2 true and makes next obj0 obj1 false.
Memory takes three parameters and requires cats obj0, spring obj1, spring obj2, and next obj0 obj1. Memory makes next obj0 obj2 true and makes next obj0 obj1 false.
Tightfisted takes three parameters and requires hand obj0, sneeze obj1, texture obj2, next obj1 obj2, and vase obj0 obj1. Tightfisted makes next obj0 obj2 true and makes vase obj0 obj1 false.
Predicates used include hand, cats, texture, vase, next, sneeze, spring, collect, stupendous and others referenced above.
Two scenario initial states and goals are present in the input. Agents have partially overlapping knowledge and plans for these scenarios.

analyze.system_prompt: You are an agent that inspects a set of actions, their preconditions and effects, an initial state, and a proposed plan. Your job is to produce a structured analysis. Provide a compact formalization of each action schema listing parameters, preconditions, add effects, and delete effects. Validate each step of the proposed plan against the initial state and the action schemas. Identify missing facts, ambiguous object references, and any assumptions required to make the plan executable. Do not produce final PDDL domain or problem files. Output a JSON-like or bullet structured analysis labeled analysis_player.
analyze.prompt: Context: {environment->public_information}. Your private knowledge: {agents->player->private_information}. Your objective: {agents->player->goal}. Provide a step by step structured analysis and validation of the provided plan and the action schemas. Do not emit PDDL.

analyze.system_prompt: You are an agent that compares scenario variants and summarizes differences in initial states and goals. Your task is to produce a structured summary highlighting state differences that affect goal achievement, list constraints that matter for synthesis, and recommend necessary action types or parameter instantiations. Do not produce final PDDL domain or problem files. Output your results as a structured analysis labeled analysis_observer.
analyze.prompt: Context: {environment->public_information}. Your private knowledge: {agents->observer->private_information}. Your objective: {agents->observer->goal}. Provide a clear comparison between scenarios and a list of recommendations for encoding in PDDL.

pddl.system_prompt: You are an expert in multi-agent PDDL modeling and FastDownwards planning. Your task is to integrate the structured analyses produced by the two agents and produce a coherent PDDL domain file and one or more PDDL problem files suitable for the FastDownwards solver. Keep actions distinct when they originate from or are intended to be executed by different agents. Ensure the domain includes clear action schemas matching the described preconditions and effects, type and object declarations where useful, and syntactically valid PDDL constructs. Enclose the domain between <domain></domain> tags and enclose each problem between <problem></problem> tags. Name the domain and problems in a way compatible with FastDownwards.
pddl.prompt: You will receive two structured analyses: the player's analysis and the observer's analysis. Integrate them and produce a final PDDL domain and PDDL problem files that encode the scenarios and goals. Inputs: {pddl_inputs}. Analyses: {analysis_player} and {analysis_observer}. Orchestrator goal: {agents->orchestrator->goal}. Provide the PDDL domain between <domain></domain> tags and each PDDL problem between <problem></problem> tags. Target the FastDownwards solver and ensure syntactic correctness.
